8B3814C843B95D054DFF7A9CF0C3BE9E: "A shock can be sudden, and might never be forgotten." - Ancient Spinjitzu Proverb
CE548B1246C9146769C29A9FCC676193: "Electricity follows the path of least resistance, a ninja does not." - Ancient Spinjitzu Proverb

64CF0107426FDA2ED0CC53B0F07F11A8:
Add to a weapon's Relic Slot while crafting to deal ELEMENTAL LIGHTNING damage and use the Electrokinesis ability. Strong against ICE. 

Deal more ELEMENTAL LIGHTNING Damage.

Electrokinesis - Charge your weapon by dealing damage. When fully charged, use <keybind touch_img="Electrokinesis">Target</> to launch yourself into the air, then use primary attack to hurl a bolt of LIGHTNING.
